name: Pause button
description: Adds a button to pause the project next to the green flag.

settings.name: Show pause button
settings.description: When hidden, you can still pause by pressing Alt+X or Option+X.

settings.name: Pause automatically
settings.description: The project pauses automatically when the window does not have focus. May not work on all projects.

latestUpdate.temporaryNotice: The pause button can now be hidden, and you can choose to have projects pause automatically in the background.
